SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
The Admin class represents an admin staff member.
AdminMainMenu
Represents the main menu for admin tasks accessible by an admin user.
Branch
 
BranchList
The BranchList class represents a list of branches.
BranchStaff
Represents a branch staff member.
ChoiceMenu
The ChoiceMenu class provides functionality for choosing menu items and quantities.
CollectOrder
The CollectOrder class provides functionality for collecting orders.
CreateOrder
The CreateOrder class provides functionality for creating new orders.
Database
The Database class provides methods for reading and writing data to/from files.
DisplayFilters
Provides methods to filter and display staff information based on various criteria.
Login
The Login class provides functionality for user login and navigation based on user type.
Manager
Represents a Manager staff member who can manage menu items, prices, and availability in a specific branch.
ManagerMainMenu
Represents the main menu for Manager staff members.
Menu
The Menu class represents a menu item.
MenuBrowsing
The MenuBrowsing class provides functionality for browsing and selecting menu items.
MenuList
The MenuList class manages the list of menu items.
Order
The Order class represents an order made by a customer.
Order_Status
The Order_Status enum represents the status of an order.
OrderList
The OrderList class represents a list of orders.
OrderMainMenu
The OrderMainMenu class provides functionality for managing orders.
OrderTimer
The OrderTimer class provides functionality for managing order timers.
Payment
The Payment class provides methods for managing payment options and transactions.
PaymentMainMenu
The PaymentMainMenu class provides methods for displaying and managing payment options in the main menu.
PaymentMethod
The PaymentMethod interface represents a generic payment method.
PaymentMethodList
The PaymentMethodList class manages a list of payment methods.
Staff
Represents a staff member in the system.
StaffList
Represents a list of staff members in the system.
StaffMainMenu
Represents the main menu for branch staff members.
UnknownStaffRoleException
The UnknownStaffRoleException class represents an exception that is thrown when a staff role is not found in the system.
Validate
The Validate class provides methods for validating user credentials and orders.
